Many of these migrants make arduous journeys ‚Äì often through human smugglers ‚Äì and arrive in need of urgent medical care. Smugglers don‚Äôt care about their well-being and often encourage them to bring children as ‚Äúvisas‚Äù to have a better shot at staying once they reach America.
